name: Shengyang Su
body:
### Objective
Looking for an part-time intern starting in fall 2015, or full-time intern starting in spring 2016

### Education
**M.S. in Computer Science**
The University of Texas at Dallas | 08/2014-05/2016 | Dallas, USA. 


### Summary    
**4-year working experience in Data Management, Risk Management and Key Account Management**
**Recent project experience related to Web Development, Big Data , Natural Language Processing, Search Engine**
* Basics: Data Structures and Algorithms, Machine Learning, Statistics
* Familiar Languages: Java, Python, R, SQL, Scala
* Web : HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Query, DOM, JSON, XML, AJAX, PHP
* Big data: Hadoop, Pig, Hive, Cassandra, Spark

### Employments                                                                                           
**Research Assistant**
Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai in New York City | Summer, 2015| New York, NY
* Load, transform and extract with large data sets of medical using R and Spark
* Made prediction of clinical drug response for cancer drugs by training and test gene expression data-set

**Data Analyst**
Ping An Insurance Group | 04/2010-08/2014 | Shanghai, China           
* Retrieved, processed and analyzed large data sets of fund reports from banks and fund companies
* Developed and maintained a series of data processing tools using VBA script, SQL and MySQL database
* Collaborated with other departments to implement data integration across enterprise systems and to optimize system performance 
* 

**Web Development**
Shanghai Cleaning Consultant | Summer, 2008 | Shanghai, China   
* Coded and debugged enterprise website system log in module using PHP
* MySQL database connection and database management and update with new raw data
* Constructed and modified the front-end web page to enhance user experience with JavaSrcipt, CSS, XML etc.

### Projects                                                                                            
**Big Data Analytic and Recommendation System (Hadoop, Pig, Hive, Cassandra, Spark and Mahout)**
* Implemented Chaining of Map Reduce job along with both in memory and Reduce side join. Achieved desired output using  secondary sorting and custom partitioning in MapReduce Job on HDFS
* Implemented various complex Pig Latin,Hive Cassandra queries to gain insightful analytics of IMDB movie database
* Developed different User Defined Functions (UDF) in Pig and Hive to filter data based on various constraints
* Recommendation based on implicit collaborative filtering via Spark, Scala and MLlib
* Developed a movie recommendation system using mahoutâ€™s Item Similarity matrix on IMDB movie data

**Sentiment Analysis on Twitter (Natural Language Processing)**
* Acquired linguistic data from Twitter through tweeter API using Python
* Analyzed user mood status using natural language processing techniques
* Located the twits on the Google map via their tweets through Google API using Python

**Search Engine**
inverted index
Compress 
Query-document score
